p:attribute.name: vendor
p:attribute.description: The name of the device vendor

p:attribute.name: model
p:attribute.description: The model name of the device

p:attribute.name: sn
p:attribute.description: The serial number of the device

p:attribute.name: ipcdver
p:attribute.description: The version of the IPCD protocol implemented by the device

p:attribute.name: fwver
p:attribute.description: The version of firmware on the device

p:attribute.name: connection
p:attribute.description: The type of connection supported by the device, one of 'on-demand' or 'persistant'

p:attribute.name: actions
p:attribute.description: The IPCD Action names supported by the device

p:attribute.name: commands
p:attribute.description: The IPCD Command names supported by the device

p:attribute.name: modelcode
p:attribute.description: The manually entered model code for the device

p:attribute.name: serialcode
p:attribute.description: The manually entered serial code for the device

p:attribute.name: v1devicetype
p:attribute.description: The v1 device type. Only valid values are AosmithWaterHeader, GenieGDOController, EcowaterSoftener. Does not apply to non-legacy devices.
